Details.Name: GreateFor
Details.Feature: Low cash advance fee of 3% of outstanding amount or 9.00 RMB (whichever is higher), when making cash advance transactions via ATM in Mainland China.
Payment in RMB is accepted for any outstanding amount from Mainland China when in Singapore.
2.5% foreign transaction fee waivered when RMB is used in Mainland China.

Details.Name: SmallPrint
Details.Feature: Rewards are available only in limited amounts and are awarded in a first-come-first served basis

Feature.Name: Welcome Gifts
Feature.FeatureDetails: S$200 cash rebate FREE Round-trip economic China Southern Airlines flight ticket to Guangzhou.
Feature.FeatureRequire: Cash rebate on available if you sign up for both the VISA and UnionPay Credit cards where you will receive S$50 for each principal card (S$50 x 2 = S$100) Sign up for 2 supplementary cards for each credit card type to receive the remaining S$100 (S$25 each x 4 = S$100). Maximum of 2 supplementary cards eligible for cash rebate for each card type. Round trip only available if S$3,000 is spent within one month of card approval and is paid in full by the end of that month.
